entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
